pkgmetadata.longdescription: Comparing Restricted Mean Survival Time as Sensitivity Analysis // Performs two-sample comparisons using the restricted mean survival time (RMST) when survival curves end at different time points between groups. This package implements a sensitivity approach that allows the threshold timepoint tau to be specified after the longest survival time in the shorter survival group. Two kinds of between-group contrast estimators (the difference in RMST and the ratio of RMST) are computed: Uno et al(2014)doi:10.1200/JCO.2014.55.2208, Uno et al(2022)https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=survRM2, Ueno and Morita(2023)doi:10.1007/s43441-022-00484-z.
